content:
Tentative Block Vote 6 planned for June 18 INM Conference Call:

This is the final Block vote for the Da Vinci Notifications Balllot. Let me know if you would like to pull an item out to discuss. You will get another opportunity on the call to remove an item.

Jira Issue Summary (Reporter) Resolution

  1. J#26201 open loop process1 (klsalzman) Persuasive with Modification
  2. J#26200 open loop process (klsalzman) Persuasive with Modification
  3. J#26199 Message Bundles2 (klsalzman) Considered - No action required
  4. J#26182 Question: Out Of Scope: What is a trigger (ginocanessa) Persuasive with Modification
  5. J#26177 Forwarding Content Question (ginocanessa) Considered for Future Use
  6. J#26173 Question on Bundle Size (ginocanessa) Considered for Future Use
  7. J#26153 is the HRex Coverage Profile still necessary (craig.newman) Considered - Question answered
  8. J#26148 clarify intermediary role(s)2 (craig.newman) Persuasive with Modification
  9. J#26143 clarify intermediary role(s) (craig.newman) Persuasive with Modification
  10. J#26132 Unsolicted notifications should be limited to defined use cases and triggers (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive with Modification
  11. J#26129 How is the intermediary going to determine what to remove1? (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive with Modification
  12. J#26117 Contract agreement to establish triggering event (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive
